name: T-Bact 2% Ointment
description: T-Bact 2% Ointment is an antibiotic medicine used to treat certain skin infections such as impetigo (red sores), recurring boils, and others

name: ADEL 78 DERCUT Oinment
description: PSORIASIS, PIMPLES (ACNE VULGARIS), ECZEMA, URTICARIA AND OTHER SKIN DISEASES

name: MEGAHEAL GEL 15 GM
description: Megaheal Gel 15 gm belongs to the group of medicines called antiseptic agents primarily used to treat and prevent infections in or around skin wounds, cuts, and scratches.

name: Meganano Gel
description: Meganano Gel is an antiseptic that is used for the prevention of wound infection. Meganano Gel kills and prevents the growth of infection-causing microbes

name: Iodosorb Iodine Gel
description: Iodosorb Iodine Gel can act as a debrider, exudate, and bacteria-killer for wounds. Its complex properties make it an integral part of some advanced wound care.
